tests.text: Your code should only have one paragraph (p) element.
Your code should only have one anchor (a) element.
Do not make any changes to the elements you created in the previous step.
tests.testString: assert.strictEqual(document.querySelector('p').innerHTML, 'See more cat photos in our gallery.')

tests.text: There should not be cat photos text below the p element.

description: Now that you turned the text cat photos inside the p element into a link, you don't need the second link below the p element. Delete the entire anchor element below the p element.
